messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Spelling & typos
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/14/2004 10:52:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time, dana.tierney@gmail.com writes: And  sorry, if you don t know the difference between spelling
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/14/2004 10:52:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
dana.tierney@... writes:

And sorry, if you don't know the difference between spelling and typos
::shrug::<<<<

No, but there IS spellcheck for those who are uptight about spelling errors.

The rest of us will gloss over it, not worry, and not point out the weakness.

~Kelly

moved to Ohio, which would be erm... late 2000 or early 2001

> like a typo or does it look like a spelling mistake? I am talking
> about people who would write confedance and feel like it doesn't make
> a difference :)
>
> But tell you what :) it has been gently brought to my attention that
> Google *does* have a spellcheck, which I had overlooked. Since my
> typos offend you, if and when I post here again, I'll be sure to run
> it just for you :)
> .........
>
> I am so confused! Aren't YOU the one who complained first about this? YOU
> are the one who brought it up! We can't help it if you are also guilty of what
> you were complaining about!
>
> Also...seems to me you had a similar 'problem' on Anne O's shining
> unschooling list a few weeks back...? You also mentioned a 'disagreement' on what
> sounded like unschooling discussion list. Maybe you just like to stir things up?
> Maybe you should think about why you like to join unschooling lists and then
> complain about unschoolers?
>
> ~Denise

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Spelling & typos
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/14/2004 8:33:06 PM Central Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: ah, more defensive nit-picking. Now tell me, does
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/14/2004 8:33:06 PM Central Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
ah, more defensive nit-picking. Now tell me, does that look to you
like a typo or does it look like a spelling mistake? I am talking
about people who would write confedance and feel like it doesn't make
a difference :)

But tell you what :) it has been gently brought to my attention that
Google *does* have a spellcheck, which I had overlooked. Since my
typos offend you, if and when I post here again, I'll be sure to run
it just for you :)
.........

I am so confused! Aren't YOU the one who complained first about this? YOU
are the one who brought it up! We can't help it if you are also guilty of what
you were complaining about!

Also...seems to me you had a similar 'problem' on Anne O's shining
unschooling list a few weeks back...? You also mentioned a 'disagreement' on what
sounded like unschooling discussion list. Maybe you just like to stir things up?
Maybe you should think about why you like to join unschooling lists and then
complain about unschoolers?

~Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
